mapper.select:
SELECT thisWeek.MTNM, NVL(prevWeek.rank - thisWeek.rank,'-999') changeRank FROM ( SELECT g.MTNM,DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(g.MTNM) DESC) rank FROM groups g WHERE g.MTNM != '0' AND g.CREATEDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE(sysdate-7) AND TO_DATE(sysdate) GROUP BY g.MTNM ) thisWeek
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT g.MTNM, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(g.MTNM) DESC) rank FROM groups g WHERE g.MTNM != '0' AND g.CREATEDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE(sysdate-14) AND TO_DATE(sysdate-7) GROUP BY g.MTNM ) prevWeek
ON prevWeek.MTNM = thisWeek.MTNM ORDER BY changeRank DESC
